creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: small embroidered piece, wider at bottom; top section is light green, tan and pink; bottom part is black, tan, pink and green on gray; trim cross bands include silver metallic threads and sequins; lined in blue
title: Top Portion of Under Apron
